Learning to read Welsh, one Tweet at a time...

Follow @tweetsinwelsh

03
Aug 2020

Bore da, wythnos nesa bydda i'n ar wyliau yng Nghymru felly, dw i'm moyn gwybod 'ble mae eich hoff gyrchfannau gwyliau yng Nghymru?'

Bydda i'n o gwmpas Penrhyn Gŵyr a Bentywyn. Gobeithio, dw i'n gallu ymweld â rhai safleoedd hanesyddol! pic.twitter.com/W3KH1sfs6d

— TheWelshHistorian (@HistorianWelsh) August 1, 2020

cyrchfan wyliau - holiday destination

o gwmpas - around

safleoedd hanesyddol - historic sites

Good morning, next week I will be on holidays in Wales so, I want to know where are your favourite holiday destinations in Wales? I will be around the Gower and Pendine. Hopefully, I can visit some historic sites!

02
Aug 2020

Pier Penarth yn edrych yn hardd yn ei binc 🌸

Gall y rhai sy'n cerdded yn Ne Cymru weld y pier pleser o Oes Fictoria ar eu teithiau. Cofiwch gadw at y rheolau ymbellhau cymdeithasol!

📷 cardiff_wales_snappers#MercherMentro pic.twitter.com/BKeJubg4KM

— Llwybr Arfordir Cymru / Wales Coast Path (@WalesCoastPath) July 29, 2020

hardd - beautiful

rheolau - rules

ymbellhau cymdeithasol - social distancing

Penarth Pier looking pretty in pink. Those walking in South Wales can see the Victorian era pleasure pier on their travels. Remember to keep to the social distancing rules!

01
Aug 2020

Wyddoch chi fod plastig wedi’i ddyfeisio ym 1907 ac, ers 1950, mae dros 8.3 biliwn tunnell o blastig wedi’i greu?

Rydym ni wedi dysgu cymaint gan Laura o @sascampaigns, am hanes plastig, ei fanteision a’i anfanteision. 🌊#GorffennafDiBlastig #WythnosSIChttps://t.co/R6HmENRmSC

— Y Pierhead (@YPierhead) July 20, 2020

wyddoch chi - did you know

dyfeisio - invent

mantais - advantage

Did you know that plastic was invented in 1907 and, since 1950, over 8.3 billion tons of plastic has beeen created? We have learnt so much from Laura @sascampaigns, about the history of plastic, its advantages and its disadvantages.

31
Jul 2020

⚡️ Tafarndai i ailagor y tu mewn yr wythnos nesaf

Bydd Prif Weinidog Cymru Mark Drakeford yn cadarnhau yfory (dydd Gwener 31 Gorffennaf) y bydd tafarndai, bariau, caffis a bwytai yn cael ailagor dan do o ddydd Llun 3 …https://t.co/rMLzdhKFSC

— Golwg360 (@Golwg360) July 30, 2020

cadarnhau - confirm

tafarn -pub

dan do - indoors

Pubs to reopen within the next week. First Minister Mark Drakeford will confirm tomorrow (Friday 31 July) that pubs, bars, cafes and restaurants can reopen indoors from Monday 3.

30
Jul 2020

Rydym eisoes wedi rhyddhau blas o berfformiadau tri o'r artistiaid a'r bandiau fydd yn chwarae yng nghyngerdd Gwerin o Gartref yr Ŵyl AmGen 🏡🎻

Dim ond un sydd ar ôl . . . 🥳

Dyma @GwilymBowenRhys 🌟

🗓 Fe gewch glywed y cyfan nos Iau am 20:00 ⏰ pic.twitter.com/8hfw7lbhD2

— Radio Cymru (@BBCRadioCymru) July 29, 2020

eisoes - already

cyngerdd -concert

cyfan - all

We already released a taste of performances from three of the artists and bands who will play at the 'Gwerin o Gartref' concerts at the Amgen festival. Only one remains.... Here is @GwilymBowenRhys. You can hear it all Thursday night at 20:00
